>
[Indestructible Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2822)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=683" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=19)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An indestructible shield is a _high-grade greater reinforcing adamantine shield_ (Hardness 17, HP 136) that can withstand just about any damage. It can be damaged only by a [disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1492) spell (roll damage as if against a creature that failed its save) or by an artifact tied to destruction.

**Craft Requirements** The raw materials must include at least 4,400 gp of adamantine.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
